'''Nedunga''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

An elderly Roparu who would be normally sentenced to starve, the catastrophe that swept through his village on Sayuka was a blessing in disguise, as he got the opportunity to try and learn weaving rugs from [Osauro](/osauro/). In return, he helps her fix anything she requires. The arrangement is unusual for the Huana, but despite living packed so densely, they both relish the opportunity to bridge gaps - especially Nedunga.
